title: Set up the integral
text: The calories lost after ‘t’ hours have to be the difference between the calories burnt and calories consumed after these ‘t’ hours. Therefore the calories intake will carry a negative sign $$-100t$$.
speech: The calories lost after ‘t’ hours have to be the difference between the calories burnt and calories consumed after these ‘t’ hours. Therefore the calories intake will carry a negative sign  minus 100 t .
